name: Dreaming in Chains
description:
Made for O2A2 game jam. Play shiritori with a deity who lives inside of your dreams! Can you beat a goddess at her own game?

--------------------

In keeping with the jam restrictions, this game has the following:

  • One character sprite
  • One in-game background
  • One menu background
  • 789 words of 1000-word limit
  • One music track
  • One "voice"

--------------------

  • Sprite Artwork: Shida 
  • Background Art: Anatoly Shaban 
  • User Interface: Azura 
  • Writing: Azura 
  • Programming: Azura, Empish
  • Music: Soul Candle 
  • Sound Effects: Azura
